definition: Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture in Gansu

prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: Linxia Hui autonomous prefectures are Hui ethnic community of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 臨夏回族自治州是甘肅回族聚居區。
